name: Jean-Pierre Beltoise
introduction: Jean-Pierre Maurice Georges Beltoise (BEL-twass; born 26 April 1937 in Paris, le-de-France, France  died 5 January 2015 in Dakar, Dakar Region, Senegal) was a French motorcycle and racing driver who most notably won the 1972 Monaco Grand Prix. His win was the last for the BRM team.  He also won the non-championship World Championship Victory Race in 1972.
